title: Input schema of the Tech Stack Monitor scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to start crawling from (site homepages, directories).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.

detectCdnsAndLibraries.title: Detect CDNs & libraries
detectCdnsAndLibraries.description: If true, analyze script src hosts and link rel preconnect for CDN/library indicators.

enqueueLinks.title: Enqueue links found on pages
enqueueLinks.description: If true, the Actor will enqueue internal links discovered on pages (site scan).
